Summary: Object dropped from above and displayed unconventi
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around March 19th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI was reclining on a sun lounge, in the backyard of a friends house witness 2looking directly up for about 30 mins. I was staring up and directly in my viewdropped an object, I noticed it straight away. I thought the object wassuspicious because of the way that it just dropped into view. the object droppedin, and paused, then moved quickly west to east, slowed down and jolted southeast. It throbbed in size i dont know whether it was an abrupt altitude changeor the actual obect changed in size. When later viewing the digital video, theobject, between two digital frames , moved from one point to anotherinstantaniously. There were tree leaves in the way that the object moved behind,and I was able to use them as a point of reference to judge the instant jump. Ilost sight of the object when it moved into a cloud and into the way of the sun.We also needed an extension cord for the camera because the battery was flat andwe had to run it off the mains.
